content.rendered:
Shahini Fakhourie is an emerging black-owned minimalist, high-end streetwear designer brand with a concentration in art, fashion and sustainability.

 

Founded in 2017 with the first capsule collection produced in 2019 in the illustration of social inequality, femininity, and sexuality, creating a consistent yet fluid brand. With minimal shapes and styles that would elevate every wardrobe, Shahini Fakhouries capsule collection is the perfect collection for all perfect to wear at home, out for brunch and to New Year's Eve Parties, the brand creates pieces that are comfortable, elevated and breathable whilst still being stylish and sophisticated.

Shahini Fakhourie is produced with sustainable fabrics, UPF 50 fabrics and vegan fabrics with a zero-waste factory. The capsule collection is now available online on the brand official online store, attached here: https://shahinifakhourie.com/collections/all
